title: By 1520 the Comunidades revolution had broken out in Castile; when the conflict reached the Tierra de Campos region, it was quickly transformed into an uprising against the lords. So the demands from Becerril can also be seen as an important piece of political discourse working almost two decades before the Comunidades revolution
